title: Ciright ONE Acquiring GoNow Assets with 8 Patents In Universal Card/Mobile Wallet Space
text:
Ciright One LLC 
LAS VEGAS, Oct. 26, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- Leveraging several years of development with GoNow Technologies, Ciright One has created the One(TM) card which is a microprocessor electronic card. The One(TM) is a "super smart" card that allows consumers to consolidate all credit, debit, loyalty and gift cards into one dynamic electronic card that communicates with a mobile wallet app. The One(TM) card when combined with the One(TM) mobile wallet app gives the user access to all of their cards "on the fly" which provides the consumer the flexibility to pay with their One(TM) universal card or smartphone. 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151026/280292 
While several companies have previously attempted to enter this space, One(TM) stands out because of its technology and early IP protections. One(TM) was built using NFC and BLE technologies and uses bank-level encryption to secure payment data, providing consumers with peace-of-mind by utilizing a secure storage vault located within the One(TM) card platform. 
In addition, One(TM) is powered by Ciright, which connects One(TM) to the cloud, then the cloud to the Ciright enterprise environment. The Ciright One platform allows the user to participate in customized promotional offers and rewards with a sponsoring bank or credit union, with the option to control the content received. 
With its exclusive license and the pending acquisition of GoNow Technologies Assets Ciright One is building the most comprehensive patent portfolio in the eWallet and Universal Card industry with 4 patents issued plus 4 more granted which encompass the following: -- The combination of an e-wallet application and dynamically programmable magnetic stripe card where the e-wallet application communicates to the Universal Card for the purposes of programming the Universal card to emulate a specific credit, debit, ATM, gift and loyalty card of the user. -- The placement of the e-wallet application onto a smart phone to be used in conjunction with the Universal Card. -- Various radio technology techniques of performing this communication and programming including Bluetooth and Near Field Communications (NFC). -- The use of an audio jack magnetic stripe reader attached to a mobile device to transmit encrypted data thru the mobile device to the Universal Card. -- The concept of "pairing" a specific device, like a user's specific smart phone, with a user's specific Universal Card. -- US Patent 9,129,270 and related filings. 
"We are extremely excited with the pending addition of the GoNow patents and intellectual property to the Ciright Portfolio, which to our knowledge are the earliest and most comprehensive in the space" said Joseph Callahan, Ciright One Chairman and CEO. "These offerings will allow the consumer to experience the newest payment technologies that include the convenience of carrying only a single all-in-one Card plus benefit from security features that reduce fraud. We will partner with banks and local credit unions to deliver consumers the most compelling, feature-rich experience with a mobile wallet to manage their financial life." 
You can reserve your One(TM) and ensure you get One(TM) as soon as it is available at www.GetMyOne.com . 
ABOUT CIRIGHT ONE LLC Ciright ONE LLC, an affiliate of Ciright, is a mobile technology solutions provider focused on simplifying everyday tasks for businesses and consumers. Ciright is headquartered in West Conshohocken, Pa., the "Liberty Valley." 
Its latest solution, the One(TM) all-in-one microprocessor electronic card, allows the user to consolidate all credit, debit, loyalty and gift cards into one dynamic electronic card along with a mobile wallet so that the user will have the flexibility to pay with either the One(TM) card or their smartphone. The platform allows the user to participate in customized promotional offers and rewards with a sponsoring bank or credit union, with the option to control the content received. 
One(TM) is powered by Ciright, which connects One(TM) to the cloud, then the cloud to the enterprise environment. Ciright prides itself on offering an infinitely expandable user-implicit, rule-based platform, the first of its kind in the market. 
For more information, visit www.GetMyOne.com .
